metadata.description: Letter from Major General Basilio Valdes to Provincial Governor Kangleon (Tacloban, Leyte) regarding Executive Order No. 23, which created a Board of Inquiry to investigate charges of disloyalty to the Commonwealth of the Philippines and the United States of America in the province of Leyte
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; Leyte; official papers; Military; letters
metadata.title: Letter from Major General Basilio Valdes to Provincial Governor Kangleon (Tacloban, Leyte) regarding Executive Order No. 23
